name: Game of Emperors
description: Game of Emperors is MMO strategy known for its deep gameplay. Build your capital, claim new territories by establishing provinces, trading posts and military encampments. Train your army to spy on the enemy and defend your Empire.
minimum_requirements: OS: 10/8/8.1/7 32/64 bit Processor: CPU Intel Pentium D 2.66GHz Memory: 1000 MB RAM Graphics: Graphics Intel HD Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 160 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: 10/8/8.1/7 32/64 bit Processor: CPU Intel Core i3 3GHz Memory: 2000 MB RAM Graphics: Graphics Intel HD 4000 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 250 MB available space
